LoginPage.title: Welcome Back!
LoginPage.description: Sign in to access your dashboard and continue optimizing your QA process.
LoginPage.testimonial: “SoftQA has completely transformed our testing process. It’s reliable, efficient, and ensures our releases are always top-notch.”
LoginPage.verifyDescription: We’ve sent a verification code to your email. Please enter it below to continue.

SignupPage.title: Sign Up
SignupPage.description: Create your account by filling the form below

VerifyEmailPage.verifyingDescription: Please wait while we verify your email address.
VerifyEmailPage.verificationSuccessMessage: Your account has been verified. You can now log in.
VerifyEmailPage.verificationFailedMessage: The verification link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new verification email.
VerifyEmailPage.missingParams: Missing verification parameters. Please use the link from your email.
VerifyEmailPage.linkSentMessage: A new verification link has been sent to your email.
VerifyEmailPage.linkFailedMessage: Failed to send the verification link. Please try again.
VerifyEmailPage.emailAlreadyVerified: Your email address has already been verified. You can log in to your account.

ResetPassword.title: Reset Password
ResetPassword.authError: Invalid or missing reset token. Please request a new password reset link.
ResetPassword.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
ResetPassword.errorMessage: An error occurred. Please try again.
ResetPassword.tokenExpired: Reset token has expired or is invalid. Please request a new password reset.
ResetPassword.marketingDescription: Your security is our priority. Reset your password safely and securely.

SettingsPage.title: Settings
SettingsPage.description: Manage your account settings and preferences
SettingsPage.profileDescription: Update your personal details and preferences
SettingsPage.profileInfoDescription: Your profile information is used across all our services to personalize your experience.
SettingsPage.securityDescription: Manage your account security and authentication
SettingsPage.securityInfoDescription: Keep your account secure with strong passwords and two-factor authentication.
SettingsPage.notificationDescription: Choose how you want to be notified about updates
SettingsPage.notificationInfoDescription: Manage how and when you receive notifications from our platform.
SettingsPage.appearanceDescription: Customize how the interface looks and feels
SettingsPage.appearanceInfoDescription: Personalize your experience with themes and display preferences.
SettingsPage.billingDescription: Manage your subscription and payment methods
SettingsPage.billingInfoDescription: Manage your subscription, view invoices, and update payment information.
